website_summaries.verdict: Easier than using a standard curling iron or hair straightener, and works fast to produce lasting curls.
pros: This wand is fast and produces professional, longlasting curls and beachy waves, and it won't overheat
cons: It can be a bit noisy, and those with fine hair might have difficulty getting their hair to stay on the wand

customer_reviews.title: A Real Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. There's a trick to using it. Once you figure it out it does work pretty well. It probably works best on longer hair. Mine is shoulder length. Still, first time out of the box it only took me about 15 minutes to curl my hair vs. nearly an hour with a regular iron. I was unable to curl the short hair at the back of my head around the nape of my neck. That will still need a conventional iron. With practice, i'm sure my results will be better.
customer_reviews.author: LSSF

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have fine, silky hair, the mechanism won't catch your hair to curl it. Tried adding several products to make my hair more "stiff" and also spinning he hair in different directions...and it still didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I curl my whole head (which is A LOT of hair) in about 15 minutes and they last all day! I have a bunch of layers in my hair and this iron grabs every strand. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the styling-challenged
customer_reviews.text: As a woman who is less than talented at styling hair, I needed a curling iron that was going to do the work for me. My wedding is approaching and I intend to save $250 by doing my own hair, and I wouldn't be able to do that without this amazing curler! My hair is thick and in a medium-length bob (somewhere between chin-length or shoulder-length). All I need to do is spend about 15 minutes with this wand and I have clean, on-purpose-looking curls that I have yet to be able to achieve with any other curlers, formers or wands.
customer_reviews.author: Lid

customer_reviews.title: Best curler ever
customer_reviews.text: This picture was taken about 8 hrs after I had used the Insta wave. I have thick hair so I curl in two different sections. The underneath first then the crown area. I have received so many compliments. This hair curler is so easy to use and the curls last all day. I spray Treseme thermal creations curl activator spray. I do this to help protect my hair. If you are like me and have trouble using the wand or a regular curling iron you will love this. I highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: take your time with this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great curling iron. But, you have to take your time to get it to work. Once I relaxed, and let the spinner catch my hair I was shocked at how easy it was to use. My hair does not tangle, I place the iron close to the roots, put a lock of hair inside the outside holders, and let the iron do the work. Honestly, if someone complains about how this iron works, its because they didn't give it a chance. I have medium length, straight fine hair. It works great and the curl holds.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Tricky
customer_reviews.text: I received the product very swiftly and was packaged securely. I have had other curling products before but I’m finding it very hard to master the use of this particular item. I have always used curlers and and InStyler curling wand and I find that this particular product is very tricky to get the hang of ....Maybe with time I can get a better grip on how to use it , Good luck to those of you out there and I hope that you can get better results than I have.
customer_reviews.author: allyoops

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on short hair
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair and this was a total waste of money. It can only be used vertically and much of my hair is too short. Their illustration of “short hair” is shoulder length. And it doesn’t grab my hair on the longer areas. Complete waste of money. Won’t be returning because original packaging was destroyed, but will give to someone with longer hair to see if it works for them. Not at all what I expected or wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to use those regular curling wands without burning myself, so I bought this instead. Amazing!!! These pics are my second time to use it. I did my whole head in about 15 minutes at 6am today. It’s now 5pm and my hair still looks great. I didn’t use any products either. Seriously, the best money I’ve ever spent on a hair tool. :)
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Well-packaged. Heats in seconds and is super easy to use. My hair is naturally very straight and can be difficult to curl. I am adding 2 pics that show what I did in literally 10 minutes. I can't believe it! If they don't last I will edit accordingly but as of right now I'm asking myself why I haven't bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Growing up, my hair wouls not hold a curl no matter how much hairspray I put in it or how long I held the iron to it. After years of never even attempting to curl it, I decided to try. My daughter used her curler on me. My hair actually held the curls!! I liked it, but the curls were too tight. I saw this and had to try it. I Absolutely LOVE it!! The perfect size curls and I have not had to put and hairspray or product on my hair. It holds the curls all day. I have gotten SO many compliments on my hair when I use this! It's super easy and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I have hair that will not curl. I have spent so much money on curling irons that will not even remotely curl my mixed girl hair. I was skeptical about this but I am a sucker to try the latest gadget and ever hopeful..... well, this curling wand actually works. Once you get the hang of it. It worked best for me if I held it to my head and let it catch my hair and wind it instead of putting a strand in the wand to catch and twirl. Anyway, my hair curls tight, and then I loosened the curls with my fingers. It is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: MJ VanHecker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't curl right
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't curl as perfect as the model in the video. I have medium length hair with layers. My hair kept getting out from the barrel because my hair was caught loose (some hair was shorter). Some parts were curled nicely some were not. I actually looked like a woman with big messy hair (with curls) when it was done. During my first time of use, I burnt my hand twice while trying to get my hair back onto the barrel. I am gonna return this and try out CHI's spin and curl that is not suppose to burn my skin. Nice concept but a lot of space for improvement
customer_reviews.author: Y. Y. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Tricky, but great once you master it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Hasn't broken on me yet. It is difficult to figure it out, but once you do, you're set! You just have to figure out if you want curls to go out or in, you have to place your hair in the front of back of the curling iron depending on which curl you want, and then get used to which way you hit the button. Just practice with it before you use it, and this thing will save your arms!
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curls for my long hair!
customer_reviews.text: I never curl my hair any more, because it is long and all one length and it never holds a curl, and takes forever to do! But I gave this a try today. It only took about 20 minutes! So easy to do. And the curls were nice. The only problem was that I had used a setting spray, which made the curls too stiff to style with just my fingers after curling, so I used a brush and then the curls were just waves. Will definitely try again without the setting spray to see how long the curls will last.
customer_reviews.author: DianeM

customer_reviews.title: I may need more practice but I found this difficult at best to use
customer_reviews.text: I have above shoulder length hair and decided to buy after reading reviews that said this works well for my length of hair. I may need more practice but I found this difficult at best to use. I could never get enough hair to pick up and wrap around the iron.
customer_reviews.author: T. Oney

customer_reviews.title: Great results for novices
customer_reviews.text: I could never curl my hair properly until now, this is totally worth it. It gets very hot, so be careful, but this is good because my curls actually lasted. I have thick hair with a fine texture. It is naturally straight with a slight wave. I opened the box, was a complete novice, but was able to create a beautiful all over style in less than 10 minutes. My husband made a rare comment on how nice it looked. You can A. section your hair and curl. B. let the curler just grab your hair in large sections. Definitely use heat protection styling products first! Completely recommend; I put my curling iron and InStyler in the closet today.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as I am terrible at curling my hair! It works fairly well but I believe if you have longer hair without a lot of layers it might work even better. I have only used it twice as I have naturally curly hair and I don't straighten it every day but I haven't quite figured out how to get the curl to hold tight around the wand. I find that I have to use a styling glove so that I can press harder... might just be my length of hair and my lack of ability! Overall, I like the product and glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ironsmom

customer_reviews.title: Not working with bob with long layers.
customer_reviews.text: I gave drying power one Star because I don't know what it is so if anyone has an idea or knows correct me. It looks easy to use, and I have a bob cut that is just above my shoulders with long layers. It said with shorter hair not to section it off. It worked ok, but I guess I need practice. There's a place on the curler that is for the hair a little ways from the scout, but cannot get it too stay. I'll just keep trying. The only tutorial videos I've seen is with women with long hair. Doesn't really help.
customer_reviews.author: L. Plantagenent

customer_reviews.title: Great for my thinning, fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curler! My collarbone-length hair has really thinned out and has always been very fine and straight. Rarely does any product keep a curl or wave in my hair. I have used the Instawave for two weeks and am very happy with the results. My hair still has some wave and body to it on the second day!
customer_reviews.author: J.E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I love this thing! I am completely clueless when it comes to curling irons and doing hair in general. I mastered this thing after three tries and honestly it's so simple and wonderful I can't remember the last time I bought a product I was so happy with! I curled my whole head of relatively thick hair in ten minutes this morning. Worth every penny. The automatic shutoff after 90 minutes is awesome too for us forgetful ladies!
customer_reviews.author: J.Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Fool Proof Curls. Plus option to still manually curl if you want:)
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use the straightening iron method, but I am cosmetically uninclined haha. When my hair was short I just followed the directions and my hair looked flawless without doing a darn thing. Now that my hair is roughly 18-22 inches, I use clips to style it by layer. I know it says to pick out an inch and set it in place (which does work wonders). However, I'm impatient so I still apply the short hair methods by layer with my long hair. When it doesn't turn out the way I want I have the option to use it as a regular curling iron by placing my hair around the iron manually.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: This might be my favorite thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This might be my favorite thing ever. I've had it over a year and use it about every other day. My hair is thin and not too long but i can curl it in under 10 minutes. I don't know what kind of magic this thing weilds but my hair has never held a curl until this. Also, the auto rotating teeth make it possible to grab the hair and do this with one hand, which is ideal for those with dexterity issues. Be aware though, this thing is HOT, even on the low setting so be sure to use some kind of heat protection or it WILL burn your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melly in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: maybe I don't know how to use it
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great and it's a decent iron. However, I tried it many times and even followed several youtube videos, it just could not catch my hair. When I put my hair in the spinner and press left/right button, the hair just fall off after 1-3 seconds. Also, I had hard time to think what direction I should put my hair and whether I should press the left or the right button this time, this automatic iron just let me to think much more than a normal iron which makes it not that "automatic". Besides, you cannot use this to curl the tail of your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Starry

customer_reviews.title: WENT FROM GOOD TO VERY BAD
customer_reviews.text: I used this item for two happy years, then it suddenly would get so hot, so fast, that it fried and broke my hair. I lost 5 inches from the back of my head, left with length only on the sides. It was very upsetting and embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thinner hair. Won't hold in curler wand.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is shoulder length and on the thinner side. It will not hold my hair in the curler no matter what angle or how much hair in the roller part. I guess better for thinker and longer hair. Good quality and speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kiely

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it this is a great curling iron. I'm definitely hair challenged and I can use it fine! My only issue with it is the way it turns the hair to curl doesn't allow for the hair to lie on the heating element firmly so the curl is looser than I'd like. I find I have to push the hair onto it, and i leave it on longer than the little timer that dings to tell you to release it. Maybe I"m doing it wrong but that's my only concern. For those who really struggle to use a curling iron this is a no-brainer item.
customer_reviews.author: britgirl

customer_reviews.title: doesn't get hair tight enough
customer_reviews.text: SO, I debated buying this for a long time before actually buying it. It doesn't tangle up your hair which was my biggest concern going into it. I read other reviews that said there was a learning curve, and there is a little bit of one. My biggest complaint is that I can't get my curls tight enough on here. It's fine for adding a little bit of texture but I can't get actual curls.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Seeger

customer_reviews.title: Nice curls!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does a good job curling but sometimes it's hard to get it to stop grabbing hair for a small section and it will grab hair from previous sections and mess up the finished curls. As a result, I've become more vigilant keeping the finished curls separate from the uncurled hair with a hair clip and the finished product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gingras

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my sister.  This is what she thinks about the product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister. She likes it but still uses a regular curling wand plus this one. She says the normal curling iron is quicker but she uses this one as well to add volume to her hair. For the price, I would think it should be the only one she needs to make her hair look nice. Since I have very curly hair, I’m unable to use the product myself. I don’t need it so I have to rely on her information to assist with this product review.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Millarr

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have an old wrist injury and curling my hair is difficult so I thought I’d give this a try. It’s great, in theory. I have fine medium length hair. I find that the “grabbers” on the barrel don’t grip my hair very well which results in a very loose curl. A very loose curl in my hair has a very short lifespan! Even when I keep my hair in the barrel longer and use a ton of styling products it still doesn’t stay curled. So this is easy and fast to use, and my hair looks nice for an hour or so, but the results just don’t last for me. It was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: clyde

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: I was totally excited by this purchase until I got it and tried it out on three different hair types/lengths midshoulder/thin midshoulder/thick and long thick. The concept is great maybe myself and two teenage daughters are inept but the darn thing just tangles our hair around it and doesn't really curl it. The little curl it did give didn't last long even with hair spray. Needless to say I wouldn't recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Sharae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Curls!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this curling iron!! Highly recommend buying it! My hair is really coarse and is very hard to curl. I have tried so many curling irons, including the Conair automatic curler and still, my hair goes straight within 15 minutes. I have tried using hairspray, hair textured products to see if that would help, but still, my hair falls flat. After using this product, my hair still holds its curls after the whole day, and even after working out. This curling iron is amazing! again, if you are looking for a curling iron, highly recommend getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the curlers that suck your hair up into them.. I love them, but often times it gets stuck and you lose a little hair. I don't have the skills for a wand, but this was EASY. Thank you to the reviewer that wrote the direction of curling - super helpful. If you're on the left side of your head, push the down button to curl away from your face - on the right side of your face push down to curl away from that side of your face. This is such a great tool, and I am kind of shocked how easy it was.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Danzig

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair purchase I've made in 30 years. Seriously. It works exactly as described. My hair is really difficult to style, heavy and soft. I have even been to a salon and the curls are all out and open within two hours of my visit, but with Instawave, they stay for 3 days!!! Also I used it on short shoulder-length hair, and now, much longer hair and the results are still great. I don't think I've ever been impressed by a product. Got the hang of it by the second try. The youtube videos are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Minoo Razavi

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not the ultimate device
customer_reviews.text: Woah I was actually pretty impressed by this. When I took it out of the box, I said "oh no way." But then I tried it and I have to say that it works! It heats up in split second time, and makes curling really fast. I have long, fine hair, but it's rather thick. The curls turn out really nice. I'm giving it four stars because it can't hold larger sections of hair, which on my hair, makes the curls look a little weird cause they're small. However, if I comb them out, the beach curls that result are pretty great. I was kind of hoping this would replace my wand, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: catchingmountains

customer_reviews.title: Actually works, and I can't curl my hair to save my life!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair which means I have to dry, then straighten my hair. After it's straightened, there's no going back. If I don't straighten it, it's fuzzy and awful. There's no way to curl it without first getting the fuzz out. That being said, this will actually curl my hair after being straightened. I can't curl my own hair with a conventional curling iron... My arms must be too dumb?! This works quite well and I'm glad I gave it a try!!
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but didn't get hot and had a difficult time grabbing hair to curl.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few of these automatic curling irons, my only complaint with this is that it didn't seem to get very hot... even plugged in after a long time it just wouldn't get hot enough to curl. It also had a very tough time grabbing pieces of hair (my hair is shoulder length). I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Summers GirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I have never done a review on any product, I am just not passionate enough about any item to take the time to share my opinions. This curling iron, however, is a must have. I would give it more stars if I could. I have very long, very thick hair and am a new mom with a 3 week old little boy. Gone are the days of having an uninterrupted hour to fuss with my hair! With this iron, my curls are perfect in about 20 minutes and they last, even without hairspray. And for under $40, it's just a no brainer. But this today!!
customer_reviews.author: ctp5e

customer_reviews.title: so I returned it an ordered the one with a 3/4" barrel which is better for my hair
customer_reviews.text: The barrel was too big for my taste (1"), so I returned it an ordered the one with a 3/4" barrel which is better for my hair; however, the little prong that grasps and holds your hair close to the barrel to curl it is a little to far away from the barrel and does not catch my hair very well. This one has the same issue with the prong.
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have patience to curl my hair or for that matter even blow dry and set my hair. I fell in love with this curling iron the first time I used it. It is so easy to use and does what it is supposed to do with minimal effort! If you aer looking to save time and effort when it comes to curling your hair, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOMS AND PEOPLE WHO SUCK AT CURLING... BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST curler I have ever owned! I absolutely suck at curling hair. I've bought so many different wands and it either takes me too long or half is ugly lol but this is a gem! I wish I would've found it sooner. It's so easy to figure out and takes no time at all to curl your whole head. As a mom of 2 (and someone who sucks at it lol) I highly recommend! Just buy it already!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Bland

customer_reviews.title: Great curler but just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this product as it is the only thing that made it simple to curl my hair and the waves lasted for days which has never happened. I purchased in December of 2018 and as of today my curler had completely stopped working. It turns on but when I press the button to curl it turns off. I am so disappointed because I love this thing. I was just hoping it would last longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m the worst with my hands, cannot paint my own nails, do opposite things while looking at mirror trying to curl or straighten my hair... so i owned many curlers but for someone like me, this is the one! Its easy to use with perfect results! Curls come out pretty strong so I usually use it the night before and by next day it becomes the soft natural curl look that i love.
customer_reviews.author: Hitomi

customer_reviews.title: fine hair, but I have been so pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I had little faith that this would work on my shoulder- length, fine hair, but I have been so pleasantly surprised. I just spray a little Argan Oil Protector on and can spin curls all the way around in less than 10 minutes. I have only (sort of) had my hair caught up once; I simply reversed the direction and was instantly free. Sometimes I leave the curls tight and other times I brush through them to give wavy body. I get lots of compliments either way!
customer_reviews.author: A. Show

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and this curling wand is meh at best. It made my curls very frizzy looking and took just as long, if not longer, than a traditional curling iron. I thought it would help me save time but it’s not only frustrating to use since I have to curl the same strand a few times to get the desired look. I would not recommend this if you have thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had this curling wand for over a year now. Before this it would take me 30mins to an hour curling my hair just for it to fall flat. This curling wand is not only the easiest I have ever used, the curls last! It literally takes me 10mins. It works best (is easiest to use on) on short or medium length hair but I have used it when I had long hair also. I could not recommend this curling wand anymore. If you're unsure on how it use it, search videos on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: If it wasn’t so expensive I’d trash it
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this is good for is burning hair. Good luck trying to get your hair on the actual barrel. Most of your hair will stay on the outside of the barrel and the little bit that actually gets heated will barely curl. So you might try to do it again and again but it won’t work so all you end up with is burnt slightly wavy hair.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Seriously. Just buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got naturally curly hair. Before - I had to straighten and THEN curl my hair (that sounds redundant- I know lol). With this device - I just blow dry my hair and then curl each piece. Now keep in mind, this tool TELLS YOU WHEN TO STOP - which is AWESOME. In addition, with this tool you do not need to be an expert with making curls. I myself,!have NEVER been able to with regular curling irons - so this device was a BLESSING for myself, my hair and my patience level 😊
customer_reviews.author: Diana J.

customer_reviews.title: Still learning how to use
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not fair to take off a star because I am not proficient at using the product yet but I cannot give it a total thumbs up. My friend has this and loves it - her hair comes out great. I have tried a few times and still have not had consistent results. Quality and features are fine. Heats up quickly, beeps when it is done....tool is clearly not the issue -- its me!
customer_reviews.author: NANCY L

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and fast!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I have medium length hair and found after using my sisters that it worked great so I ordered my own. The first time I used the product it did take a little practice, but this morning (my second time using it) I was able to curl my hair in about 10 mins! I got a lot of compliments at work and the curl has held all morning and without hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca W

customer_reviews.title: ... bought one of these last year from Target and loved it but it broke on me
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of these last year from Target and loved it but it broke on me. I just purchased this one from here and I am in love with the new version. It beeps when the temperature is ready and it also beeps when it is done curling for you to release the curls. I highly recommend this product. My har does not hold curls very well the only way I can get my curls to stay is by using this product thank you so much KISS!
customer_reviews.author: Linda De Santiago

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE. BROKE AFTER ONE USE. Waste of money. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: I used the curler once and it worked perfectly. Normal speed, quick and beautiful curls. The second time I used it, it took a much longer time to curl my hair. The speed was dramatically reduced. It would twist for a second then stop, then continue for another second and stop again. I turned it off for a few minutes and let it rest. But it happened again the next day. Defective and broken. A big waste of money. It worked so well the first time but every time after that, it was useless. Might as well have used a regular curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Testing phase
customer_reviews.text: I just tried it out this morning. It's definitely easier than a traditional iron, and definitely takes less time. My only complaint so far, is that it's difficult to to curl the back of your hair because you need to hold the rod more vertically. Also, it's been about an hour and my curls have mostly fallen out, but that has probably more to do with how I set the curls than the iron. Itself. Will update my review as I learn more about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to use - works great!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my many years I can have curly hair if I want. Really effective curler. Be careful, it's hot and the barrel is exposed. Don't try to curl up near your head. Also better to curl smaller sections for a few seconds rather than roast larger sections for longer. It's very fast and I have enjoyed using it - strangers compliment me on my curls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Was so hopeful I’d found a Dyson knock-off. And I thought the price tag meant there may be some quality. I should know better by this point in life, but I digress. Didn’t curl my hair just knotted it up and I literally had to yank it out of my hair and ripped a chunk of hair out. Do your hair a favor and don’t.
customer_reviews.author: _katacombs_

customer_reviews.title: The only curling iron that will hold my curl and not break my hand!

product_meta.title: Kiss Products Instawave Automatic Ceramic Curling Iron, 1” (KACI01)
product_meta.description: The Kiss Ceramic Instawave automatic hair curling iron is the perfect styling tool for those who just can’t style with conventional curling irons and/or wands. The revolutionary Kiss Instawave is a fully automatic curling iron that easily creates beautiful, long lasting curls in an instant. Achieve salon styled curls at home with just a push of a button, it’s that easy. Watch as our patented curling dial instantly catches and curls your hair, transforming straight locks into tangle-free glamorous curls in seconds. You can even curl in different directions for a more natural styled look. Our innovative patented design prevents the spinning wand from getting stuck or tangled. If your hair does get stuck, simply spin the curling dial the opposite direction to release the hair. With Ceramic Ionic technology, this automatic curling iron allows the hair to lay smooth and shiny while fighting frizz and flyaways. No need for heat resistant gloves, simply place a section of hair on the Instawave and leave the rest of the curling to us. It even comes with an auto 90 minute shut off feature just in case you forget to turn it off while rushing out the door. Achieve instant curls every time you use the Instawave! Never burn yourself, tangle your hair, or be left with any unwated kinks and dents again! Buy your very own today to see what the hype is all about! Always unplug it immediately after using.
feature_bullets: Kiss Ceramic Instawave automatic hair curler is the perfect styling tool for those who just can’t style with conventional curling irons and wands.
Patented Curl Dial has ridges/prongs that act as combs which smooth and detangle hair as it curls
The ceramic ionic technology fosters healthy, shiny salon style curls or waves with less frizz and damage with just a touch of a button
Kiss automatic hair curler has two heat settings that can reach up to 420 ° F. It also has an auto shut off after 90 minutes of use. Comes with 2 year limited warranty.
Your hands are never near the hot iron so there is no need for a heat resistant glove. Ensure hair is clean, completely dry and combed before using this curling tool
